content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinThe CORE team has uploaded a new updated version of the wallet to the CORE Wallet website. Feel free to download the new version: https://wallet.coremultichain.comThe CORE Wallet is a multi-coin platform, supporting all the EVM compatible chains, such as Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, HECO, and Gnosis, as well as the CORE Blockchain.
